content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Smelting Area (Position 0,0 to 4,4)
Consists of three stone furnaces:
- Furnace at (0,0) with coal fuel and copper plate output
- Furnace at (2,0) with coal fuel and copper plate output
- Furnace at (4,4) with coal fuel and copper plate output

### Copper Cable Production Line (Position 7,11 to 12,11)
Consists of:
- Input wooden chest at (7.5,11.5) containing copper plates and cables
- Long-handed inserter at (6.5,11.5) moving items from position (4.5,11.5) to (8.5,11.5)
- Assembling machine 1 at (9.5,11.5) crafting copper cables
- Burner inserter at (11.5,11.5) moving output from assembling machine to storage
- Output wooden chest at (12.5,11.5) containing iron plates, copper cables and electronic circuits

### Storage Area (Position 14,11 to 16,11)
Series of wooden chests:
- Chest at (14.5,11.5) containing iron plates and copper plates (full)
- Chest at (16.5,11.5) containing iron plates

### Power Generation System (Position -9,24 to -2,24)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5,24.5) producing water
- Pipe network connecting pump to boiler
- Boiler at (-7.0,24.5) converting water to steam
- Steam engine at (-3.5,24.5) generating electricity
- Electric pole network distributing power

### Science Pack Handling (Position 0,28 to 0,31)
Consists of:
- Burner inserter at (0.5,30.5) moving items from chest to lab
- Storage chest at (0.5,31.5) containing automation and logistic science packs

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing inserters in occupied spaces
- Check if target position is clear before attempting to place inserters
- Remove existing entities if they occupy needed space
- Verify correct coordinates for inserter placement

### Power connection issues
- Ensure assembling machines and inserters are connected to power network
- Place electric poles within connection range of machines
- Monitor machine status for "NO_POWER" warnings

### Resource flow issues
- Monitor ingredient shortages in assembling machines
- Ensure proper item transport chain from source to destination
- Verify inserter pickup and drop positions align with machine inputs/outputs
